title: Signatures Innovation Fellows Program invites faculty to apply (University of California - Berkeley)
text: ( Source : University of California - Berkeley ) UC Berkeley 's Signatures Innovation Fellows Program , which supports faculty and researchers in data science and software projects, is inviting applications as it expands to a second cohort. The
